title: No DTL train service due to signalling fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 由于信号故障，DTL 无列车服务
title_translations.ms: Tiada perkhidmatan kereta DTL kerana kerosakan isyarat
title_translations.ta: சிக்னல் கோளாறு காரணமாக DTL ரயில் சேவை இல்லை

updates.text: DTL is back to normal service since 9.00am. Free bus rides and bridging bus services have ceased. Once again, we are sorry.
There is no DTL train service due to a signalling fault. Free bus rides are available at all designated bus stops. We are sorry.
